item.description:
Cambridge Brewing Company
1 Kendall Square, Bldg 100 (Cambridge)
Thursdays from 8 PM - 11:30 PM

Whether you're learning Japanese or English, buy a drink, join the table, and practice your new language in a friendly and relaxed environment. Don't miss out on this opportunity to practice over a few drinks.

Please note that due to the location, you must be at least 21 to enter.

* Note: This is the location for this week's event. It will change every week, so please verify the location weekly.

***Also, if you will be joining us, please make use of public transportation. Not only is driving while intoxicated dangerous, but there may not be any parking available in the area.

So join us! (I'll try to post a sign so you can find us)

~Lindsay
item.name: Japanese Evening Table
